entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is described as a house-elf who is hiccuping and being watched by others.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is described as a house-elf who is whispering to Harry Potter about Winky.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is described as the person being whispered to by Dobby.

relationships.description: Dobby is concerned about Winky's well-being, as evidenced by his sad whispering and shaking of head.
Harry Potter is being whispered to by Dobby.
